name: Sacrificial Fragments

refinement_effect.refine_one: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 18s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has an 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 14s.

description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.
